markdownRemark.html:
I enjoy talking to people about what I have learnt from my experimentations with technology. Sometimes I simply talk about my experiences and sometimes, I help them learn something new. Here are a few presentations that I have made in some of the community meetups, conferences or events with larger audiences.

Presentation Title Event Links
Scaling Computer Vision: From tutorials to fundraising DevFest 2022 Ahmedabad, Surat, Patna, Dec 2022 Slides
Cloud is all you need DevFest 2022 Gandhinagar, Ranchi, Durgapur, Guwahati, Nov-Dec 2022 Slides
Plan More, Code Less - Planning for scalable solutions GDSC NIT Durgapur, Nov 2022 Slides
Opportunities in IT and How you can be a part of it Guest Lecture at NSEC, Kolkata, Nov 2022 Slides
Finding insights in centuries old photos - A Google Cloud AI Story DevFest 2022 Mysuru, Siliguri, Oct-Nov 2022 Slides · Video
Cloud Costs Optimization: from $1,700 to $150, at 10x the performance Google Cloud Community Days 2022 Mumbai, Mysuru Slides
Let’s Design a high availability ML heavy Cloud solution architecture Google Cloud Community Days 2022 Indore, Pune Slides
Build your own EasyCard payment system Google I/O Extended Kolkata 2022 Slides · GitHub
Preparing for the future of tech Guest Lecture at Sister Nivedita University, 2022 Slides
Introduction to Audio AI Google I/O Extended by GDG Jammu, July 2022 Slides
